text: Hi does anyone have experience or know of tools for GoCardless and HubSpot? Or is mainly just to post to GC and redirect back once paid ?
anyone else having issues with the DM? I have had issues publishing and also all portals are just slow
i think there is an issue with cloudflare as I am seeing that issue on alot of sites (non-HS) so not sure if HS is having issues as well.
some of my previews are also returning a 502 error
<https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/>
Chicago is being rerouted right now
So any site being served from cloudflare will likely appear slow
just saw a moment ago one of my clients site threw an error, not happening right now though(went away)  appreciate that update <@U6GNQ7JBU>
Does anyone know if I’m committing a code crime by stripping out auto-generated OG tags from the head and injecting new ones with JS?
will the facepolice and twitectives come after you, no, but I think you should definitely run your pages through this <https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/> <@U26DA9CQ0>
Oh I didn’t think it worked off of a crawler! I thought share links were just fetching the meta tags when you opened up the share page.

I’m also trying to figure out if you can have a separate image for different social media channels. I know Twitter uses a different thing altogether but I can’t tell if I’m able to have different Fb/Li images
yea it does use crawlers, and each search engine might be different, as in may not execute JS

This might help test the other networks
<https://socialdebug.com/>
Thanks Jon!
Can you preview a blog template on a specific post? preview with options just shows the most recent one.
has anyone any idea about the “text” option in the “LegalConsentOptions” ? i need to know were i can find this text in HubSpot.
Not at this time. I believe they were working on being able to do it one a specific post but right now it's not possible
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/UBT0AHWLD/FDBJYHKMK/bildschirmfoto_2018-10-10_um_20.19.45.jpg>
For clarification: it is the highlighted text that i send to HubSpot ( in addition to the other required information). I would like to know were i can see this text in HubSpot.
Additional Information: I am sending Form Data via the Form API to HubSpot

Kind of freaking out here. I keep trying to post a GIF to our account (hurricane-related, VERY timely), and it keeps refusing to let me select the image unless it's under some insane file size of like 2MB. is there a place to adjust this?
I have to spend ~10+ minutes to get it resized to a point where it will upload, where it is blurry and no longer informative.
Try converting it to a video
You could try something like <https://ezgif.com/optimize>
Or upload to gify
or as chad said, if its wayy to large, convert to video
thanks! don't have time to convert it that's for sure, but ~5mb should be totally acceptable to post, I would think. getting it under 2 is near impossible without sacrificing literally all quality
can you upload it here? i am sure that Photoshop can resize it pretty well
<@UD5DDN5QS> Photoshop is really good at decreasing the file size
i can help you if you want
I've been resizing them with Photoshop, thanks :slightly_smiling_face: It's just HubSpot that's not letting me select the image. it uploads, but I can't choose it unless it's under 2 or so MB
so I'm just going to tweet them without HubSpot :slightly_smiling_face:
ok
btw why are those images so large?
Isn’t the max file size for Twitter 5mb?
even 4k images can be below 500k with great quality out of PS
not sure why they're exporting so huge, but they are. they're animated gifs that start ~100mb...so believe me when I say I'm crunching them! lol
but the gifs aren't that long, maybe 3-5 seconds
have you tried webm?
i reduces files quite good
same as webp
<@UD5DDN5QS> <https://ezgif.com/gif-to-webm>
<@UD5DDN5QS> i  decreased the video filesize of a mp4 from 28MB to 8MB on webm
